Support.navigator

Class TPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.mvc.TView
      • Support.navigator.TPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IView, IPage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JFXPage

    public abstract class TPage
extends TView
implements IPage
    Contains generalised method implementations of page components specified by IPage interface.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Object insideRootNode
      Object of inside graphical root node to which all other components should be attached.
      private boolean isInitialised
      Tells whether the onInit() event has been triggered or not.
      private INavigator navigator
      Reference to the navigator component.
      private int pageIndex
      Unique index of the page given by the navigator component to which this page is attached.

        Reference to the top node of component tree.
        Throws:

      • initComponent

        protected abstract void initComponent()
                               throws TError
        Method to initialise components and invoked by the init event.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • onInit

        public void onInit()
            throws TError
        Initialisation event. Typically used to initialise the components placed on the page. The event is triggered by that navigator component to which the page is added. Initialisation event is not occurred when the class is instantiated but after it is attached to a navigator component.
        Specified by:
        onInit in interface IPage
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • onDraw

        public void onDraw()
            throws TError
        Component draw event. Typically used to draw the components placed on the page. The event is triggered by that navigator component to which the page is added.
        Specified by:
        onDraw in interface IPage
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • setPageIndex

        public final void setPageIndex(int pageIndex)
                        throws TError
        Sets the unique page index of the page. Determination of the index happens by the navigator component to which and after which the page is added.
        Specified by:
        setPageIndex in interface IPage
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - The index of the page.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.
